DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD_BANK LENDS VIETNAM $ 96 MILLION TO HELP FARMERS
DOC.TEXT: The World_Bank has signed an agreement with Vietnam for a $ 96-million development loan to improve the country ' s rural credit_system and rubber production , an official report said Friday . The loan is the bank ' s third to Vietnam since international lending resumed last fall . The 40-year agricultural credit will carry a concessional interest_rate , but the report from the state-run Vietnam News_Agency did not specify the percentage . International banks began again to lend to Vietnam following President Clinton ' s decision in July to end U.S. opposition to such a step .
